Interface Entity

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CannonShot, NPC_Ship, Person, Player, Ship

    public interface Entity
    Author:
    Adam Torres

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        void draw(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
        Draw the Entity
        Parameters:
        batch - The batch the Entity will be drawn to

      • move

        void move()
        Move the entity across the screen

      • getSprite

        com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite getSprite()
        Get the sprite that the Entity is drawn from. All entities should have a sprite.
        Returns:
        sprite the Entity is drawn from

      • getPosition

        com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 getPosition()
        Get the position of the entity. All entities should have an x and y of type float. The position returned is the lower left hand corner of the entity by default
        Returns:
        the lower left hand corner of the entity in the form of a 2D vector (0,0)

      • getCenterPosition

        com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 getCenterPosition()
        Get the center position of the entity
        Returns:
        the center position of the entity (width/2, height/2)
        See Also:
        getPosition()

      • getX

        float getX()
        Get the x position of the entity. By default the lower left corner of the entity is (0,0) DOES NOT RETURN THE CENTER X
        Returns:
        the x position of the entity
        See Also:
        getCenterX()

      • getY

        float getY()
        Get the y position of the entity. By default the lower left corner of the entity is (0,0) DOES NOT RETURN THE CENTER Y
        Returns:
        the y position of the entity
        See Also:
        getCenterY()

      • getCenterX

        float getCenterX()
        Get the center x of the entity.
        Returns:
        width/2
        See Also:
        getX()

      • getCenterY

        float getCenterY()
        Get the center y of the entity.
        Returns:
        height/2
        See Also:
        getY()

      • disposeTextures

        void disposeTextures()
        Ensure that all resources are freed from the implementing class. Also caries out animations or anything else essential to death. batch can be null if no SpriteBatch is needed for animation

      • getHitBox

        com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle getHitBox()
        Gives the hit box of the entity based upon it's sprite
        Returns:
        the hit box of the entity
